clients.title: The Top 5 Resolutions for a Better Website in 2018
description:
1. Make the most of your homepage. This is the strongest page on your site. If you haven’t already, make sure your homepage provides substantial, original and valuable information about your firm and your core services.
  2. Make the most of your Google My Business listing. Local searches are extremely important for your marketing efforts. Encouraging your clients to submit reviews to your local listing is a great way to strengthen your visibility for local searches.
  3. Do some housekeeping. Here are a few simple ways you can maximize your marketing efforts:
    • Beef up your attorney profiles or about the firm pages. These are normally popular pages on your site. Highlight your strengths.
    • Look for components of your site that could be improved. Look at content on pages, photos, etc.
    • Ensure your Justia Lawyer Directory profile and any other profile you may have is up to date.
    • Verify that your Google My Business listing is up to date and used to its fullest extent.
  4. Make sure every call and contact from prospective clients is promptly answered. Your prospective clients will reach out to multiple firms at once. Making sure you talk to them as soon as possible increases your chances of turning that lead into a paying client.
  5. Add new original and high quality content to your site. Content continues to be one of the strongest signals for Google. Adding new original and high quality content that’s valuable to your clients is a great way to keep your site relevant to your prospective clients and in Google.

description: 2018 is here and you should make sure your profile is up-to-date. Here are some tips for completing your profile
